title: GitDiff2Docx Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the GitDiff2Docx tool that converts git diffs to Word documents

language.description: The language code for localization (e.g., 'de' for German)

verbose.description: Enable verbose output for detailed logging

diff_font.description: Font family to use for diff content in the Word document

diff_font_size.description: Font size for diff content in the Word document

open_after_creation.description: Whether to open the generated Word document after creation

heading_level.description: Heading level for file sections in the Word document

add_color.description: Hex color code for added lines in the diff (without #)

remove_color.description: Hex color code for removed lines in the diff (without #)

neutral_color.description: Hex color code for unchanged lines in the diff (without #)

add_symbol.description: Symbol used to indicate added lines in the diff

remove_symbol.description: Symbol used to indicate removed lines in the diff

neutral_symbol.description: Symbol used to indicate unchanged lines in the diff

file_encoding.description: Character encoding for reading and writing files

include_first_commit.description: Whether to include the first commit in the diff analysis
